name: Grid-Structural pseudo-class
description: The **grid-structural** pseudo-class is made for structural grids like tables. The `:nth-col()` pseudo-class represents a cell belonging to the column in a grid structure that has nth-columns before it, while `:nth-last-col()` will count from after that column.
example_description: `:nth-col()` will set a gray `background-color` to each second column counting from the first column and `:nth-last-col()` will add a green `background-color` to every third column counting from the last column.
